Token.Abstract: The TICDSDocumentSyncManagerDelegate protocol defines the methods implemented by delegates of a TICDSDocumentSyncManager object.
Informs the delegate that the sync manager has started the document registration process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager encountered an error during the document registration process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error that was encountered.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager paused the document registration process because the remote file structure does not yet exist for the specified document.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique identifier for the document (as supplied at registration).

Parameter.Name: aDescription
Parameter.Abstract: The description of the document (as supplied at registration).

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: The user info dictionary (as supplied at registration).

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager has resumed the document registration process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager failed to complete the document registration process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the registration process completed successfully.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to allow the delegate to return a custom location for a local directory to contain the helper files the TICoreDataSync framework uses to synchronize a document.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique identifier for the document (as supplied at registration).

Parameter.Name: aDescription
Parameter.Abstract: The description of the document (as supplied at registration).

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: The user info dictionary (as supplied at registration).

ReturnValue.Abstract: The NSURL for the location you wish to use.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to ask the delegate whether the document sync manager should automatically initiate a Whole Store Upload at registration.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A Boolean indicating whether to initiate the upload.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to ask the delegate for the URL of the document's SQLite store to upload.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anIdentifier
Parameter.Abstract: The unique identifier for the document (as supplied at registration).

Parameter.Name: aDescription
Parameter.Abstract: The description of the document (as supplied at registration).

Parameter.Name: userInfo
Parameter.Abstract: The user info dictionary (as supplied at registration).

ReturnValue.Abstract: The location of the store file.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager has begun to upload the whole store file, together with necessary helper files.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager encountered an error during the whole store upload.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager failed to upload the whole store file.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager finished uploading the whole store file successfully.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to ask the delegate for the URL of the document's store once it's been downloaded.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

ReturnValue.Abstract: The location of the store file.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager has begun to download the whole store file, together with necessary helper files.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager has downloaded the store to a temporary location, and is about to replace the store at the given location.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: aLocation
Parameter.Abstract: The location of the persistent store that will be replaced.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager has replaced the store at the given location with the downloaded store.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: aLocation
Parameter.Abstract: The location of the persistent store that was replaced.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager encountered an error during the whole store upload.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager failed to upload the whole store file.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager finished uploading the whole store file successfully.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager has begun to synchronize the document.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sychronization process was paused because a conflict was detected.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: aConflict
Parameter.Abstract: The conflict.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the synchronization process continue after a conflict was resolved.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that changes were made to managed objects in the application's context on a background thread during the synchronization process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: aNotification
Parameter.Abstract: The NSManagedObjectContextDidSave notification object containing changes made to objects.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager encountered an error during the synchronization process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that warnings were generated during the synchronization process.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: warnings
Parameter.Abstract: An array of NSDictionary objects containing information about each warning.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager failed to synchronize the document.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager finished synchronizing the document.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to ask the delegate whether the document sync manager should automatically remove unneeded files at registration.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A Boolean indicating whether to initiate the vacuum.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager has begun to remove unneeded files from the remote.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager encountered an error wile vacuuming unneeded files from the remote.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: anError
Parameter.Abstract: The error that was encountered.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager failed to vacuum unneeded files on the remote.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the document sync manager finished vacuuming unneeded files from the remote.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager has begun to process the changes that have occurred since the previous save: of the managed object context.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: aMoc
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager failed to process the changes that have occurred since the previous save: of the managed object context.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: aMoc
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context.

Token.Abstract: Informs the delegate that the sync manager finished processing the changes that have occurred since the previous save: of the managed object context.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: aMoc
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context.

Token.Abstract: Invoked to ask the delegate whether the document sync manager should automatically initiate Synchronization after finishing processing changes in a synchronized managed object context.

Parameter.Name: aSyncManager
Parameter.Abstract: The document sync manager object that sent the message.

Parameter.Name: aMoc
Parameter.Abstract: The managed object context that saved.

ReturnValue.Abstract: A Boolean indicating whether to initiate the upload.
